strings.Value: "None of you move, we're not done here."
"Nok-Nok, deal with your tribe."
"I'll let you all leave, but if I catch you here again, I'll execute you. Understand?"
"Where are you taking them?"
"You better NOT be taking them to the capital like Munguk, or so help me..."
"Fine. Let's get out of here."

{n}The goblins seem ready to bolt... you catch Long-Legs slowly uncurling himself from the pile, apparently ready to run. You do notice a number of the goblins are looking at Nok-Nok with a strange fascination... dealing with the giant must have impressed them.{/n}
{n}Nok-Nok steps forwards, and gives a series of cracking hisses to get attention, and all the goblins stare at him.{/n}
"Weeee not go anywhere," {n}Long-Legs says slowly.{/n} "We not have anywhere to go. Maybe all stay here, yes?" {n}He adds hopefully.{/n}
{n}As you start getting confused looks, Nok-Nok whispers to you.{/n} "You hard to understand because you use longshanks words – use too many, and out of order."

{n}After their eyes are on him, Nok-Nok, his eyes narrowed, goes to each one of them in turn and raps them twice on the head. Hard. They wince, but say nothing... except for one feeble groan from a goblin more sober than the rest.{/n}
"You need to go to bigger place or I hit you again. I show you, me Warden." {n}The goblins stare blankly at this, Nok-Nok sighs.{/n} "Me Big Hero. Follow me, take you to new place."

"Make great deal with you — you need to go to bigger place or I hit you again. I show you, me Councilor." {n}The goblins stare blankly at this, Nok-Nok sighs.{/n} "Me Big Hero. Follow me, take you to new place."
{n}Nok-Nok turns to you.{/n} "Warden and Big Hero Nok-Nok take care of them. All good."
{n}The goblins nod, and begin to untangle themselves, but they are doing what Nok-Nok says, some of them rubbing their heads.{/n}
{n}Nok-Nok turns to you.{/n} "Councilor and Big Hero Nok-Nok take care of them. All good."
{n}Nok-Nok turns to you.{/n} "Diplomat and Big Hero Nok-Nok take care of them. All good."

"Make great deal with you — you need to go to bigger place or I hit you again. I show you, me Diplomant." {n}The goblins stare blankly at this, Nok-Nok sighs.{/n} "Me Big Hero. Follow me, take you to new place."
"Make great deal with you — you need to go to bigger place or I hit you again. I show you!" {n}The goblins stare blankly at this, Nok-Nok sighs.{/n} "Me Big Hero. Follow me, take you to new place."
{n}Nok-Nok turns to you.{/n} "Big Hero Nok-Nok take care of them. All good."

{n}Nok-Nok pauses, as if he's forgotten what happened a few moments ago – and you realize he has.{/n} "Capital big enough. Yes, Capital!" {n}Before you can stop him, he turns to the goblins.{/n} "All, you, go to capital, Nok-Nok command you, GO!"
{n}Nok-Nok pauses, then nods.{/n} "Capital not bad idea. All, you, go to capital, Nok-Nok command you, GO!"
{n}To your horror, the goblins scamper away, running in all directions... but toward the direction of the your capital city.{/n}
"Oh my. Just..." {n}Jubilost stands with his mouth open for a few moments, obviously at a loss for words, then sighs with a defeated look on his face.{/n} "Oh my."
"The end of your {mf|barony|barony|kingdom|kingdom} just drew closer. Much closer."
"More green cuties? Nice! And you all should stop yelling at Nok-Nok! — Can't you see how hard he's trying to be a good advisor?!"
